inclusion.criterion: symptoms of pain and disability in at least one hip joint
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: positive MRI findings stage I or II on the ARCO classification
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: previous hip joint surgery on the affected hip
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe pain and disability at rest if treating clinician has recommended surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 60 year old man complaining of frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing that started 6 years ago and is worsening.
